formulas.name: Matrix Multiplication
formulas.description: Row of A times column of B. A(m×n) × B(n×p) = C(m×p). NOT commutative: AB ≠ BA generally.

formulas.name: Determinant (3×3)
formulas.description: Expand along any row or column using cofactors

formulas.name: Determinant of Scalar Multiple
formulas.description: Common mistake: |kA| ≠ k|A|. Each row gets multiplied by k.

formulas.name: Determinant of Product
formulas.description: Determinant of product equals product of determinants

formulas.name: Inverse of Matrix
formulas.description: Matrix is invertible (non-singular) iff determinant is non-zero

formulas.name: Inverse of 2×2 Matrix
formulas.description: Swap diagonal, negate off-diagonal, divide by determinant

formulas.name: Inverse of Product
formulas.description: Order reverses for inverse of product

formulas.name: Transpose of Product
formulas.description: Order reverses for transpose of product

formulas.name: Cramer's Rule
formulas.formula: xᵢ = Δᵢ/Δ where Δ = det of coefficient matrix
formulas.description: Solve system of linear equations using determinants. Unique solution when Δ ≠ 0.

formulas.name: Collinearity Condition
formulas.description: Three points are collinear if the triangle area determinant = 0

formulas.name: Cayley-Hamilton Theorem
formulas.formula: Every matrix satisfies its own characteristic equation
formulas.description: If det(A−λI) = λ²−5λ−2, then A²−5A−2I = 0. Used to find A⁻¹ and higher powers.

formulas.name: Rank-Nullity Theorem
formulas.description: Relates rank to null space dimension
